name: Barry Bailey
text: LARRY IS GOOD GUY

name: Mark Hill
text: Nice store, but I fear the web will do away with them as they're over priced from online orders

name: Meg Ford
text:
On October 17, 2020, my son and I walked into this store to purchase a pair of boots. As soon as we walked in the store, the manager said, "The most inexpensive boot we have is $125."  Not hello, hi, how are you; you know, like normal people. I replied, "Excuse me?" He repeated the statement. I said, "What did you just say?!" He repeated the statement!
I was offended. He did not greet us but instead made this derogatory and disparaging statement. I guess my son and I did not look like we BELONGED in his store.  My eleven year old son asked to see the expensive shoes. The most expensive shoe in the store was thousands of dollars and IF I WANTED TO SIR, I could have purchased that boot right then and there! So watch how you speak and treat people. You know that status of no one that walks in that store, sir. Against my better judgment, I allowed my son to purchase a Stetson hat he really liked, he loves cowboy hats. I still kick myself for even allowing him to buy that hat! I let my son handle the transaction by himself. I was on the other side of the store but believe me I was all eyes and ears. He then asked my son if the money he pulled out of his pocket($100 bill) was birthday money. My son replied, " No, this is hard work money." What?! Is this how you entreat customers, sir? I was very upset that we were treated like this. Then he went on to tell my son how to handle the hat. My son could have had a collection of these hats! But he did not bother to ask, he assumed my son had never had an expensive hat "like that" ($65🙄) and didn't know what to do with it. Sir, you were way out of line! I pray you correct your spirit and not treat others like you treated me and my son. But then again, I am so sure you do not treat EVERY customer like this, only the ones you cast judgment on because they don't  LOOK LIKE they can afford your merchandise. Get real! I started to come back in your store today and tell you personally how you offended us, but OTHERS NEED TO KNOW. Sir, it appears that the only thing needing a STAMPEDE is your condescending, prejudice and pernicious spirit. 😌

name: Dee Stephens
text: Went in, told the gentleman what I was looking for, he showed me what he had, I bought and was told return policy all in about 7 minutes. My kind of shopping.

name: FROFROSAGGINSXX
text: Bought my first pair of boots here. Awesome staff. Good prices and gives great advice for boots care. Check them out.

name: Charlene Shealey-Heath
text: Always satisfied when I visit here. Daily specials are always a good option or 1 of their salads. They're always busy so call ahead and order if you want it to go. Place is always clean. Waitresses are normally friendly and on point unless they're short handed

name: Marie D
text: It's a small store with little selection of boots, which is what I was looking for.

name: Jamie Latham
text: The salesman was awesome! He was very patient and willing to help. However the lack of technology in this store is ridiculous! They had to hand write each item I bought on 4 different papers, and it took over 30 minutes to complete the task, not to add one of the pairs of boots were not entered in correctly and he had to re-ring them back up, and write down all that information. A small computer with a barcode scanner and receipt printer, and they would be fantastic. But I don't see that happening. I won't be back.

name: Danny Chain
text: Very Friendly and very Knowledgeable staff and a lot to choose from reasonably priced and love their Rewards Program

name: Thomas Harrell
text: Great selection... Service took longer than I would have liked to even acknowledge us, but when we did get helped the salesman was good.

name: Jill Seward
text: Great service and wide variety of boots.  Slightly over priced and the return policy is an in-store credit only.

name: Renee Simmons
text: Decent

name: jimmy stegall
text: Very nice staff but just another run of the mill boot store nothing special.

name: M BURGAMANN
text: This store received this 2 star VERY sparingly, it should have been a 1(Due to Cust. Service, & an impatient employee named Brent/Bret). Driving from ATL to pick up a hat or 2, or even 3 Right after I got off work, so I can wear my pride on my vacation next week I walked out emptyhanded. Lids your company did not get my business today & I clearly drove 100+ Miles to shop with you, due to your impatient employee I left the store.  have to do a better job,  this guy could NEVER Get a job with our organization, with this lack of customer service displayed. Very Disappointed

name: Pernell Moore
text: Has a pretty good selection of fitted and snapbacks. But if you're looking for something like a Kangol the selection is tiny.

name: Pernell Moore
text: They've got plenty of fitteds but their kangol selection was severely lacking.

name: Anitra Horn
text: Good service... need a better variety of shoes...

resp.text: Hi Anitra Horn, Thanks for sharing your experience! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Niky Li
text: Horrible experience! The staff wouldn’t let me purchase shoes because they claimed I had already been there earlier that day. I usually NEVER set foot in Finish Line. I have 0 points on my rewards. They also claimed they had footage of me on their security cameras but couldn’t show proof of it. They lied about the shoes they had in stock. I was offered one size, but after some discussion in the back, the staff told me that size wasn’t available anymore and i couldn’t purchase anything because of my “previous visit that morning.” I can’t believe the staff lied and would not let a buying customer purchase from this store, just so they can keep the shoes for themselves!!

name: Chelsea Williams
text: Placed an order online to pick up in store. Received confirmation email but no other communications about pickup. Called customer service to cancel the order after 3 days of hearing nothing and they said I had to call the store. Called this store & they said my order had “already been processed out as if were picked up on accident .” I asked them to go ahead & cancel the order anyway since I clearly had not come to pick it up. They said they would have to see my ID in store to process the cancellation . I asked why no ID was needed to “process it out” to begin with & they said it was a mistake. I asked what happens if I don’t pick up the shoes, thinking they would have to automatically issue the refund, and these people said the shoes would just sit there since their system shows that I had paid & picked them up. They refused to cancel my order & insisted I had to show them my ID to get my money back. Customer service determined that  was A LIE!!! Had to call customer service back & get them to call this store just to get my money back. Terrible customer service. Never shopping here again.

name: Jacob Li
text: Horrible staff. My cousins and I went to buy some Jordan’s at the Finishline in Dothan, Alabama. They let me check out and they then went to get a size 11 for my cousin but then came back to tell us that another employee claimed that he already saw us here earlier this morning. Not only did they refuse show any proof (cameras) that we were here, they were rude and it didn’t seem like they cared. After that, I told my brother to come and get the size 11 for my cousin. They then said that every size had been raffled off and that only size 8 was available! I’m 100% sure that they planned on backdooring the pairs for themselves or to resell. Why would a shoe store manager refuse to sell shoes to customers and lie, claiming that we were here earlier but we all rode in the same car. This is most definitely the shopping worst experience I’ve ever had.

name: Kevin Li
text: Been racially profiled at this store. They would not let us purchase shoes there and they told us to leave. They lied about not having a shoe so they can back door it and keep it for themselves. The team there is very corrupted and scandalous.

name: Glenda Watson
text: Good sales and great customer service 👏

resp.text: Hi Glenda Watson, Thanks for sharing your experience! We appreciate your feedback.
